item.title: [Python] [2020 version for beginners] Recommended study method for those who want to become AI engineers by themselves
item.description: # Service introduction (AI Academy and AI Academy Bootcamp) This is an AI learning service for individuals operated by us. ① AI Academy Online AI programming learning service where you can learn Python, machine learning, deep learning for almost free *About 300 types of practical content can be used for 980 yen per month. ② AI Academy Bootcamp Short-term intensive AI programming boot camp for individuals (AI programming school) Python course (50,000 yen per month) Data Scientist Course (¥120,000 for 2 months) Machine learning engineer course (120,000 yen for 2 months)
